mapper.select: SELECT tnm.NOTICE_ID noticeId, tnm.SUBJECT subject, SUBSTR(tnm.CREATED_DATE, 1, 10) createdDate, tni.IMAGE_URL imageUrl FROM tb_notice_main tnm LEFT JOIN tb_notice_img tni ON tnm.NOTICE_ID = tni.NOTICE_ID AND tni.REPRESENT = true WHERE tnm.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY tnm.CREATE_DE DESC LIMIT ${param.offset}, ${param.size};
